Simplifying this equation, we get 10.5x >= 90 + 3x. By subtracting 3x from both sides, we have 7.5x >= 90. Dividing both sides by 7.5, we get x >= 12. Therefore, it will take at least 12 years before Carlos starts earning money on the lemon tree.", "answer": "12"}
